org.apache.giraph.aggregators

接口 Aggregator<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    A - Aggregated value
    所有已知实现类:
    BasicAggregator, BooleanAndAggregator, BooleanOrAggregator, BooleanOverwriteAggregator, DoubleMaxAggregator, DoubleMinAggregator, DoubleOverwriteAggregator, DoubleProductAggregator, DoubleSumAggregator, FloatMaxAggregator, FloatMinAggregator, FloatOverwriteAggregator, FloatProductAggregator, FloatSumAggregator, IntMaxAggregator, IntMinAggregator, IntOverwriteAggregator, IntProductAggregator, IntSumAggregator, LongMaxAggregator, LongMinAggregator, LongOverwriteAggregator, LongProductAggregator, LongSumAggregator, TextAppendAggregator

    public interface Aggregator<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Interface for Aggregator. Allows aggregate operations for all vertices in a given superstep.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void aggregate(A value)
      Add a new value.
      A createInitialValue()
      Return new aggregated value which is neutral to aggregate operation.
      A getAggregatedValue()
      Return current aggregated value.
      void reset()
      Reset the value of aggregator to neutral value
      void setAggregatedValue(A value)
      Set aggregated value.

    • 方法详细资料

      • aggregate

        void aggregate(A value)
        Add a new value. Needs to be commutative and associative
        参数:
        value - Value to be aggregated.

      • createInitialValue

        A createInitialValue()
        Return new aggregated value which is neutral to aggregate operation. Must be changeable without affecting internals of Aggregator
        返回:
        Neutral value

      • getAggregatedValue

        A getAggregatedValue()
        Return current aggregated value. Needs to be initialized if aggregate or setAggregatedValue have not been called before.
        返回:
        Aggregated

      • setAggregatedValue

        void setAggregatedValue(A value)
        Set aggregated value. Can be used for initialization or reset.
        参数:
        value - Value to be set.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Reset the value of aggregator to neutral value
